other_tests.findings: The heterogeneously echogenic liver is noted without focal lesion. No intrahepatic or extra-hepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The CBD measures 5 mm in diameter. The gallbladder is slightly distended, without evidence of gallstones. The gallbladder wall is normal with no pericholecystic fluid. Normal hepatopetal portal venous flow is noted. The spleen measures 10.1 cm.
